name: Hobgoblin Weapon Expertise
summary: You increase your training in battlefield weapons.
description:
You increase your training in battlefield weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in all weapons you are trained in from Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity.Traits

Hobgoblin: Hobgoblins are a sturdy, clever people with a propensity for militaristic order
